description: The U.S. military’s surprise strikes on Yemen’s Houthi militants over the weekend continued into Monday after Defense Secretary Pete Hegseth pledged an “unrelenting” campaign until the group stops attacking vessels in the Red Sea. “This campaign is about freedom of navigation and restoring deterrence. The minute the Houthis say, ‘We’ll stop shooting at your ships,…
title: Hegseth pledges ‘unrelenting’ strikes on Houthis in Yemen: What to know

description: West Virginia Gov. Patrick Morrisey (R) on Monday said he will take legal action against the NCAA over West Virginia University’s (WVU)’s snub from the March Madness tournament. “I’ve asked Attorney General [JB McCuskey] to launch an investigation into the NCAA tournament selection committee to determine if any backyard deals, backroom deals, corruption, bribes or…
title: West Virginia governor says he’ll take legal action against NCAA over tournament snub

description: The Department of Homeland Security (DHS) said on X Monday the deported assistant professor from Brown University’s medical school attended the funeral of a terrorist in Lebanon.  The agency said Rasha Alawieh went to Lebanon in Feb. to go to the funeral of Hassan Nasrallah, a terrorist who was part of Hezbollah.   He was…
title: DHS says deported Brown University doctor attended funeral of ‘brutal terrorist’

description: Rep. James Clyburn (D-S.C.) said he doesn’t know what happened late last week that resulted in Senate Minority Leader Chuck Schumer (D-N.Y.) and nine other Senate Democrats voting to advance the GOP continuing resolution to keep the government open. In an interview on MSNBC this weekend, Clyburn said he thought Senate Democrats were “on board”…
title: Clyburn says he thought Senate Dems were ‘on board’ with opposing funding bill: ‘What happened?’

description: The White House on Monday pushed back on a French politician who called for the United States to return the Statue of Liberty to France, jabbing the “low-level” French lawmaker. “Absolutely not,” White House press secretary Karoline Leavitt told reporters during the daily briefing about the chances of sending the statue back. “And my advice…
title: White House on French politician suggesting US return Statue of Liberty: ‘Absolutely not’

description: California Gov. Gavin Newsom is using his statements on transgender athletes to shift the focus of the country's electorate from culture wars and populism to policy and results, and to defuse any and all culture war arguments that the Republicans may use against him.
title: Gavin Newsom will be upsetting Democrats for 4 years, and that’s a good thing

description: We must address the twin demands of growing our commercial shipbuilding capacity along with our merchant fleet and increasing our ability to speed up military vessel construction.
title: America’s maritime industry can’t handle a clean energy future

description: Senate Democratic Leader Chuck Schumer (D-N.Y.), who has been the target of scathing criticism from members of his own party after voting for a Republican-drafted stopgap spending bill that cut many nondefense programs, says things are looking good for the Democratic Party, which he says has “a real direction now.” Schumer told The New York…
title: Schumer: Democrats have ‘a real direction now’

description: Senate Democratic Leader Chuck Schumer (N.Y.) has postponed his book tour scheduled this week in Baltimore, New York, Washington, D.C., and Philadelphia amid an intense backlash from fellow Democrats over his controversial vote to advance a House Republican-drafted funding package that cuts deeply into non-defense programs. A spokesperson for Schumer’s book tour said that it…
title: Schumer postpones book tour amid backlash over funding vote

description: President Trump's administration must devise and implement a plan now to secure the U.S.-Canada border, as human smugglers are taking advantage of the largely undefended land and illegal crossings are poised to skyrocket.
title: The overlooked threat: America’s northern border

description: New York Gov. Kathy Hochul presented President Trump with data showing that the controversial traffic congestion program, congestion pricing, is working, and is helping to reduce traffic congestion and increase retail sales in New York City.
title: Hochul: Congestion pricing is ‘working’

description: President Trump's sudden decision to shut down US government-funded entities such as the Voice of America is understandable, but it is crushing for a number of journalists there who have not destroyed their own credibility.
title: Congress must save the good journalists at VOA

description: Democrats and Democratic-leaning independents in a new poll say they want the party to focus on pushing back on the Republican agenda — not on working across the aisle. In the CNN survey released Sunday, a majority — 57 percent — of Democrats and Democratic-leaning independents say they want the party to work to stop…
title: Most Democrats want party to mainly focus on stopping GOP agenda: Survey

description: We need to think MEGA – Make our Economies Great Again – for all our prosperity and security.
title: Tech partnership can make US, UK economies great again

description: The Trump administration would be wise to reverse course and implement a logical, evidenced-based approach to improving the Department of Education that does not harm children now or in the future.
title: Linda McMahon’s haphazard cuts to the Department of Education will be costly
